availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Gill Roberts (Frankfort, Kentucky, physician and soldier)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, surgeon and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Anne (Nancy) Weisiger Roberts. Married to Martha Ann Todd Roberts.Father of Joseph Weisiger Roberts. Physician in Franklin County, Kentucky in 1850. Physician in Franklin County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the War of 1812 and in the Mexican-American War. Served in the 40th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Surgeon.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 53B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 384.
